extendedInfo.description: Blood Alcohol Content calculator to estimate just how little alcohol it takes to put someone on the "wrong side of the law".Blood Alcohol Content calculator is can be used to estimate the amount of alcohol in your blood after drinking. It supports two types of calculators: - The Simple BAC : which contains a list of common drink types (beer, wine, vodka, whiskey) and- The Advanced BAC : which you can actually input the amount of ounces consumed and its alcoholic percentage.

reviews.title: Wrong
reviews.comment: I weigh 190lbs. Told it I had 7 drinks in 3 hours and it said my BAC is .40.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Don\'t waste your time. It is nowhere close to being accurate. Said my friend was of legal limits & not impaired, yet she couldn\'t walk, & was vomiting
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Ok but too simple: it needs to start by asking gender since that makes a BIG difference in BAC. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Decent BAC Calculator
reviews.comment: Things I would like to suggest for the next update: 1. Ability to combine drinks (2x 1.5oz Tequila & 3x 12oz Beer) 2. Expand time period past 5 hours.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not useful for heavy drinkers. Only goes up to 8 drinks and 5 hours
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Cool app on my samsung mesmorize.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not as easy to use or accurate as \'j2j drunk meter\'. Also drunk meter is integrated with facebook!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Metric support
reviews.comment: Completely useless app because of the lack of support for metric units.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Pl list out the countries & their alcohol limits. Would be nice each drink listed has a quantity or volume in litres, % alcohol in each type of drink
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not sure what the accurisy is perdrink but fun to ply with . It needs to go higher then 5 houts though and the addition of a meal.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not bad. Simple and easy to use

reviews.title: Very limited.

reviews.title: Sikki Nixx
reviews.comment: I gave it a low rating because it doesn\'t have enough alcohol choices, example it doesn\'t list everclear.

reviews.comment: All it needs now is to imput how long since eating and it\'ll be perfect.

reviews.comment: I swear Ocyfir I only had one beer!

reviews.comment: I feel this app is accurate enough to stop someone from driving DUI. I highly recommend!!!

reviews.title: Poor unit
reviews.comment: Poor use of unit. Add in feature for different unit selection

reviews.comment: who only drinks a certain drink in a set time frame, why not , bar dice , mixers and a road soda !!

reviews.comment: Fun to play with. Wouldn\'t stand up in court or anything, but it gives you an idea.
